mapper.select: SELECT s01.id AS id, s01.NAME AS `name`, FROM_UNIXTIME(s01.createDate) AS createDate, CASE WHEN s01.sex = 'MALE' THEN '男' WHEN s01.sex = 'WOMEN' THEN '女' WHEN s01.sex = 'OTHER' THEN '其他' END AS sex, s01.photo, s01.birth, s01.nationality, s01.resume FROM `soin-music`.`t_singer` AS s01 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{limit};
